workExperiences.name: FreeLance IT LAB
workExperiences.description:
At Freelance IT LAB, I am working as a React Frontend Developer, contributing to the development of an online education website. My responsibilities include building frontend React components to enhance the user experience and ensure seamless navigation for learners.
Through my work, I aim to deliver high-quality, responsive, and user-friendly frontend solutions that contribute to the success of the online education platform.

workExperiences.name: Oasis Info Byte
workExperiences.description:
Worked as a Full Stack Web Development on multiple projects including GUI projects using HTML, CSS,Tailwind CSS, JavaScrip, React.js,MongoDB, Express.js, Node.js.


I have created the tasks during Web Development internship :- Landing page, Pizza Delivery Website and Weather App.
